title: Calories in Root Beer
meta_description: Discover calories in root beer per 12 fl oz serving, including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick tweaks for diet versions or floats.
assumptions: Standard commercial root beer (e.g., A&W or Barq's), regular sweetened version, no diet or zero-sugar.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, and serving size; diet versions differ significantly. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 12 fl oz serving of root beer contains about 170 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 scoop vanilla ice cream for a float

faqs.q: How many calories in a can of root beer?
faqs.a: About 170 kcal in a standard 12 fl oz can.

faqs.q: Does root beer have sugar or carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 46 g sugars and 46 g total carbs per 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: Is root beer high in sodium?
faqs.a: Moderately, with about 35 mg sodium per serving.
Typically 0 kcal, as it's sweetened with artificial sweeteners.

faqs.q: How does root beer compare to other sodas?
faqs.a: Similar to cola, around 140-170 kcal per 12 fl oz, mostly from sugars.
